titleStmt.title: By the Lords and others His Majesties commissioners an order for the observance and execution of the statute made for the reliefe and ordering of persons infected with the plague.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales.

notesStmt.note: This item appears at reel 1685:57 as Wing E1269 (number cancelled), and at reel 1700:2 as Wing E928.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
